TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SocketException extends System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a socket error occurs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and <xref:System.Net.Dns> classes when an error occurs with the network.
The default constructor for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> class sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system socket error that occurred. For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation on MSDN.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the last operating system error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system socket error that occurred. For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winsock/winsock/windows_sockets_error_codes_2.asp).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 errorCode) cil managed

Docs.param: The error code that indicates the error that occurred.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to `errorCode`.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified instances of the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> class.

Docs.summary: Gets the error code that is associated with this exception.
Docs.value: An integer error code that is associated with this exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property contains the error code that is associated with the error that caused the exception.
The default constructor for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system error that occurred. For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN.

Docs.summary: Gets the error message that is associated with this exception.
Docs.value: A string that contains the error message.

Docs.summary: Gets the error code that is associated with this exception.
Docs.value: An integer error code that is associated with this exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.SocketErrorCode%2A> property contains the error code that is associated with the error that caused the exception.
The default constructor for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system error that occurred. For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN.
